Text: Doesn't work for me, I see no "Setup.bin" in the folder, could be infected but I highly doubt it.
Don't bother downloading this. The required setup file is missing and there's nothing to unrar or unzip.
It works for me so you need to download the dotNetFx40_Full_setup and the xnafx40_redist and it will work the thing you need to do after that is there is a file called terraria double click it.
